flavor_text: This Pokemon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks the Pokemon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
When it finds a stone of a suitable size it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
